about_the_game:
With Trivia Tricks Friend Pass you can play online multiplayer with up to 8 players!
You can play against each other, or as a team against Trivia Bosses. Choose from 13 base categories and an endless amount of user created Workshop Categories! You can also give a Twitch Chat a podium where they answer when a majority is reached by typing in chat!

With Friend Pass you will be able to join online lobbies using a Room Code provided by an owner of the full game. As a Friend Pass player you won't be able to make lobbies of your own, and will lack access to certain features such as Character Customization which are only available in the full game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-5005U / AMD A9-9420
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 / AMD Radeon R5 Stoney Ridge Mobile
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Targets 720p output at 30fps / Aspect ratios outside of 16:9 are letterboxed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8279U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
  • Additional Notes: Targets 1080p output at 60fps

short_description: Play The Ultimate Trivia game for free! Have one friend own the full game, host a lobby and share a room code! Play competitively against your friends, or team up to take on Trivia Bosses in Co-Op! Play with a ton of categories including user-created Quiz Packs from Steam Workshop!
